metadata.title: CVE-2023-46047 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue in Sane 1.2.1 allows a local attacker to executearbitrary code via a crafted file to the sanei_configure_attach() function.NOTE: this is disputed because there is no expectation that the productshould be starting with an attacker-controlled configuration file.

criterions.comment: sane-backends package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
